info.title: HRIS API
info.description: Welcome to the HRIS REST API reference. This page documents the REST resources available in Symphony, along with expected HTTP response codes and sample requests. You can use the POS17 REST API to build add-ons for POS17 Apps(CMS, PORTAL, Mobile Apps), develop integrations between POS17 and other applications, or script interactions with POS17.

tags.name: Employee
tags.description: employee details, assigning employee work Schedule and adding employee
